snippet: When Mitt Romney’s campaign has struggled, the candidate’s wife has been a relentlessly upbeat figure inside the Boston headquarters and on the trail.
abstract: Mitt Romney's wife Ann has remained an upbeat figure both inside headquarters and on the campaign trail, even when the candidate himself has struggled, and is assuming a larger presence as the presidential race enters its final weeks.

byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO, ASHLEY PARKER and SHERYL GAY STOLBERG

lead_paragraph: When Mitt Romney’s campaign has struggled, the candidate’s wife has been a relentlessly upbeat figure inside the Boston headquarters and on the trail.

headline.seo: Ann Romney Takes Larger Campaign Role
headline.main: Ann Romney Takes Bigger Role on Behalf of the Man She Knows
headline.print_headline: A Bigger Role on Behalf of the Romney She Knows
